WITH RECURSIVE months AS ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL DAYOFMONTH(CURDATE())-1 DAY), INTERVAL 11 MONTH), '%Y-%m') AS month, DATE_SUB(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL DAYOFMONTH(CURDATE())-1 DAY), INTERVAL 11 MONTH) AS d UNION ALL SELECT DATE_FORMAT(d + INTERVAL 1 MONTH, '%Y-%m'), d + INTERVAL 1 MONTH FROM months WHERE d + INTERVAL 1 MONTH <= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL DAYOFMONTH(CURDATE())-1 DAY) ), codes AS ( SELECT 1 AS st_cd UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6 ) /* 불법주차 리스트 코드 이벤트 코드 ( 1: 불법주차(미등록차량) / 2: 불법주차(장애인미탑승) / 3: 스티커 불법 사용 / 4: 위험상황 / 5: 물건적재 ) */
/* 월별, 코드별 갯수를 조회 */ SELECT m.month AS st_date, s.st_date, d, c.st_cd AS st_cd, IFNULL(s.st_cnt, 0) AS st_cnt FROM months m CROSS JOIN codes c LEFT JOIN tbl_statistics s ON s.st_cd = c.st_cd AND STR_TO_DATE(s.st_date, '%Y%m') = STR_TO_DATE(m.month, '%Y-%m') ORDER BY m.month, c.st_cd;
